## **7. Verification of Effectiveness (VoE)**

* **Criteria:** [Define how to confirm objectives and deliverables are achieved]
* **Evidence Required:** [PRs, reports, approvals, attachments]
* **Responsible Reviewer:** [Person verifying effectiveness]

**Effectiveness Assessment Options:**

| Assessment          | Definition                                           | Follow-up                                                                                    |
| ------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Effective           | All objectives met; controls functioning as intended | Close Plan. Routine monitoring only                                                          |
| Partially Effective | Some objectives or controls partially met            | Open Issue(s) to capture limitations or residual risk; re-verify after resolution            |
| Ineffective         | Objectives not met; controls failed                  | Escalate to Top Management; open Issue(s) for corrective action; re-verify after remediation |

> Record verification summary and attach evidence within this Plan Issue. Reference related MR cycles as applicable.
